name: Build A Burger
description:
Build A Burger is a puzzle game where you have to build a burger. It's a simple concept with complicated gameplay. Many of the puzzles are more complicated then they initially seem. But it is very rewarding once you finally figure it out.

This game was created by two LIU Student and was presented at Indiecade East 2018. It is still a work in progress, but hey, it's free so why not give it a shot.
